document.title: Pellete de liens du 05-07-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Chris Coyne.com CFDG - Context Free Design Grammar Ce programme genere des fractales a partir de simples fichiers descriptifs. (Tags: design soft fractales )
Gizmo A free phone for your computer An internet telephone. As simple as an instant messenger. Now youre talking. (Tags: linux mac windows voip telephonie )
XHTML Quicktime Object Afficher un objet QuickTime au format XHTML valide. (Tags: css xhtml quicktime )
Menus dynamiques - Le Net : Webmaster - Logiciels Libres - Framasoft Menus XHTML + CSS2 + javaScript verticaux et horizontaux.
Font guide for webmasters Until font downloading technology is perfected, Web designers must normally restrict themselves to fonts that are available on most users computer systems. (Tags: fonts webdesign )
Eclipse.TechForge.com :: The Total Eclipse Resource Ressources autour de l'IDE Eclipse. (Tags: eclipse extensions plugins )
